link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

generic:link.msg:message: Identity "Value of Book Value of the Assets acquired from banks/Fis = (Assets acquired from sponsor banks + Assets acquired from sponsor Fis + Assets acquired from Other banks + Assets acquired from Other Fis)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Book Value of the Assets acquired from banks/Fis = (Of 1, Principal Outstanding in books of bank / FI + Of 1, interest component at the time of Acquisition (For the columns 'Total as at the end of quarter' & 'As at the end of previous quarter))" do not tally
Identity "Value of Book Value of the Assets acquired from banks/Fis = (Of 1, assets acquired on bilateral basis + Of 1, assets acquired on auction basis)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Book Value of the Assets acquired from banks/Fis = (Value of assets acquired as per type of loans and advances - Retail Loans, Corporate Loans, MSME Loans)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Book Value of the Assets acquired from banks/Fis = [Of 1, Principal Outstanding in books of bank / FI + Of 1, interest component at the time of Acquisition (For the column 'Position during the quarter')]" do not tally
Identity "Value of the assets transferred to the Trust for securitisation < or = Book Value of the Assets acquired from banks/Fis)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of the assets transferred to the Trust for securitisation during the quarter < or = Book Value of the Assets acquired from banks/Fis during the quarter)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Of 2, above asset resolved = (by change in management + by take over of management + by sale of business, + by lease of business + by reschedulement of payment of debt + by enforcement of security interest + by settlement of dues of the borrower + by taking possession of secured assets)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Book Value of the Assets acquired from banks/Fis at the end of the current period = (Book Value of the Assets acquired from banks/Fis at the end of the previous quarter and Book Value of the Assets acquired from banks/Fis during the quarter)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Principal Outstanding in books of bank / FI at the end of the current quarter = (Principal Outstanding in books of bank / FI at the end of the previous quarter + Principal Outstanding in books of bank / FI during the quarter" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Interest component at the end of the current quarter = (Interest component at the end of the previous quarter + Interest component during the quarter)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of the assets transferred to the Trust for securitisation at the end of the current quarter = (Value of the assets transferred to the Trust for securitisation at the end of the previous quarter + Value of the assets transferred to the Trust for securitisation during the quarter)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Assets acquired, balance outstanding at the end of the current quarter = (Assets acquired, balance outstanding at the end of the previous quarter + Assets acquired, balance outstanding during the quarter)" do not tally.

Cost of acquisition of assets at the end of the current period should be the sum of values reported for Cost of acquisition of assets at the end of the previous period and Cost of acquisition of assets during the period

Identity "Value of Assets acquired and resolved at the end of the current quarter = (Assets acquired and resolved at the end of the previous quarter + Assets acquired and resolved during the quarter)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Amount of Security Receipts issued = (Amount of SRs subscribed by the selling bank/Fis + Amount of SRs subscribed by FIIs + Amount of SRs subscribed by other QIBs + Amount of SRs subscribed by the ARC)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Amount of Security Receipts completely/partially redeemed = (SR redemption-ARC, SR redemption-QIB & FIIs + SR redemption - Seller Bank)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Amount of Security Receipts issued at the end of the current period = (Amount of Security Receipts issued at the end of the previous quarter and Amount of Security Receipts issued during the quarter)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Amount of Security Receipts completely redeemed at the end of the current quarter = (Amount of Security Receipts partially redeemed at the end of the previous quarter + Amount of Security Receipts partially redeemed during the quarter)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Amount of Security Receipts partially redeemed at the end of the current quarter = (Amount of Security Receipts partially redeemed at the end of the previous quarter + Amount of Security Receipts partially redeemed during the quarter)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Amount of Security Receipts Outstanding at the end of the current period = (Amount of Security Receipts Outstanding at the end of the previous quarter + Amount of Security Receipts Outstanding during the quarter)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of NAV of SR Outstanding = (NAV of SR Outstanding at the end of the previous quarter and NAV of SR Outstanding Position during the quarter)" do not tally.

va:valueAssertion.test: if($V2>0) then round( $V3 *10000) div 10000 = round (( $V1 div $V2 )*10000) div 10000 else $V3 = 0

generic:link.msg:message: Identity "(Value of Percentage of Security Receipts subscribed by ARCs during the period = (Amount of Security Receipts subscribed by ARCs/ Amount of Security Receipts issued) * 100)" do not tally.

va:valueAssertion.test: if($V2>0) then round( $V3 *10000) div 10000 = round (( $V1 div $V2 )*10000) div 10000 else $V3 = 0

generic:link.msg:message: Identity "(Value of Percentage of Security Receipts subscribed by ARCs during the period = (Amount of Security Receipts subscribed by ARCs during the period / Amount of Security Receipts issued during the period) * 100)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Portfolio of Assets Acquired = (Assets acquired from sponsor banks + Assets acquired from sponsor Fis + Assets acquired from Other banks + Assets acquired from Other Fis)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total value of assets resolved from the date of acquisition = (For less than one year + 1-2 years + 2-5 years + More than 5 years)" do not tally.
Identituy "Value of SRs Balance Outstanding as at end of quarter = (Value of SRs Issued - Value of SRs Redeemed)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total values reported for financial year wise disclosures = (Sum of values reported for each financial year)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total values reported for financial year wise disclosures = (Sum of values reported for each financial year)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total values reported for financial year wise disclosures = (Sum of values reported for each financial year)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total values reported for financial year wise disclosures = (Sum of values reported for each financial year)" do not tally.
Total values reported for Bank/FI wise disclosures should be the sum of values reported for each Bank/FI wise
Total values reported for Bank/FI wise disclosures should be the sum of values reported for each Bank/FI wise

va:valueAssertion.test: if($V3>0) then round( $V1 *10000) div 10000 = round (( $V2 div $V3 )*10000) div 10000 else $V1 = 0

generic:link.msg:message: Identity "Value of Percentage of Security Receipts Held by Secured Creditors of Borrower = ((Amount of SR held by secured creditors of borrower / O/S total SR from the system for the borrower) *100)" do not tally.
Values reported for each Bank/FI should be less than or equal to the total values reported for Book Value of the Assets acquired, Total amount redeemed out of assets acquired and Outstanding Amount
Values reported for each Bank/FI < or = total values reported for Cost of acquisition
Identity "Value of Amount Outstanding = (Total Acquisition Price in form of Cash + Bonds/debentures + SRs - Total amount redeemed out of assets acquired)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total upside income of ARC, QIBs, FIIs and Selling Bank together at the end of the current period = (Upside income at the end of the previous quarter + Upside income during the quarter)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Cost of acquisition of assets, at (1) above, by the ARC (2(i)+2(ii)+2(iii)+2(iv)) = (from sponsor banks ((a) + (b) + (c)) + from sponsor FIs ((a) + (b) + (c)) + from other banks ((a) + (b) + (c)) + from other FIs ((a) + (b) + (c)))" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total of cost of acquisition of assets from Sponsor Banks or Sponsor FIs or Other Banks or Other Fis = (Consideration paid by issue of bonds and debentures + Consideration paid by cash + Consideration paid by issue of SRs)" do not tally.
